__e: So call a cab. You're supposed to be protecting me.
And I've never seen anyone walk all over you.
All I ask you to understand is that... after the use that Bertha made of me... after all that her behaviour has since implied... it is impossible that you and I should meet.
He said that he took advantage of Livia coming to leave, but he had the idea to run away for quite some time.
Fucking used me to take him out and help yourself.
I believe you mean you exploited the hands of the red man and the black man to build it for ye.
He took advantage of his power and his position, and you didn't give him the drive because you are a good person at heart.
He was a user, and she just couldn't see it.
I took advantage of you, and... and for that I am deeply sorry.
Is there any weakness we haven't exploited yet?
When they finished with us... When they used us all up...
You're ping-ponging between these two men who have done nothing but use and abuse you, and i'd have more sympathy for you except you let them do it for a buck.
